SUMMARY: JSON-GLib implements a full JSON parser using GLib and GObject
DESCRIPTION: Use JSON-GLib it is possible to parse and generate valid JSON data structures, using a DOM-like API. JSON-GLib also offers GObject integration, providing the ability to serialize and deserialize GObject instances to and from JSON data types.
inherit: gnomebase lib_package gobject-introspection gtk-doc gettext ptest-gnome manpages upstream-version-is-even
